dict.acceptation: 提供，给予；提出，提议；出价，开价；表示愿意；
提议；出价，开价；试图；求婚；

sent.orig: A high acceptance-to-offer ratio would establish an organisation's reputation as an employer of choice.
sent.trans: 高的Offer接受率代表作为雇主建立了高的组织声誉。

sent.orig: Reserve negotiations on any matters to the time of you HAs a job offer.
sent.trans: 把这一些疑难题目留到你拿到任务的offer时再协商吧。

sent.orig: To close with an offer; to entertain an offer; to accept an offer.
We have given our careful consideration to your counter offer against our offer for Woolen sweaters.
sent.trans: 贵方对本公司羊毛衫报盘所做的还盘，本公司已做过审慎的考虑。

sent.orig: An offeree who makes a counter-offer thereby loses the power of accepting the original offer.
sent.trans: 发出反要约的受要约人丧失了承诺原则要约的权利。
